long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you ever had a problem choosing a route to fly in the Virtual Airline?

Well I hope this extension will solve your problem.
 
Generate trips for vspirit, virtUAL and vAAL with up to 100 legs.
Customize your search with:
- aircraft type
- amount of legs
- maximum duration of one leg.
